meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive David Faber Dana Perino Kareem Abdul-Jabbar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6377.

div.div:
2012 Power Players Week game 2.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: David Faber, an anchor and reporter from CNBC's Squawk on the Street and The Faber Report
Dana Perino, a TV host from Fox News Channel's The Five
Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, a Basketball Hall of Famer and all-time leading scorer from the NBA

tr.td: LAKERS
THEIR MAIN MUSICAL INSTRUMENT
SQUAWK ON THE STREET
FINE FOOD
THE FIVE

td.a: THE NEW YORK TIMES 21st CENTURY HEADLINES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', '(Kareem: What is X?)
(Alex: No.)
[Loud laughter from audience]
(Alex: You went in the wrong direction! We were looking for a [*] rating, not an X rating. Remember, Kareem, this is a family show.)

G

Kareem
Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', 'The 5 movie ratings in the U.S. are NC-17, R, PG, PG-13 & this one')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The 5 movie ratings in the U.S. are NC-17, R, PG, PG-13 & this one

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Kareem: What is the California gubernatorial race?)
(Alex: I need you to be a little more specific.)
(Kareem: What--what is the California gubernatorial election?)

a recall

Kareem
Triple Stumper
')

Dana

(Dana: What is a year?)
(Alex: No.)

(David: Good. What is good?)

day

KareemDanaDavid
Triple Stumper

$7,000
the Guggenheim Museum')

tr.td: MUSEUMS
Completed in 1959, it's been variously described as a snail, a concrete tornado, even a giant wedding cake

David

6 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
